As part of my SteamServerBrowser project I included a modified version of this library.
https://github.com/PredatH0r/SteamServerBrowser

It contains some bugfixes, automatically handles retries on timeouts (e.g. due to UDP packet loss), deals with the throttling of Valve's master servers and has improved threading to prevent the UI thread from blocking when the ThreadPool is full.

that's great news, thanks!

I just found a few more bugs, maybe you already fixed them too:
  • Parser.ReadShort() returns a signed short, so port numbers >=32768 will show up as negative numbers.
  • Server.Current() does not check if the EDF (extra data flag) is even preset in the data buffer. Games like TheShip don't have that data, which results in an ArrayIndexOutOfBounds when you try to read that byte.
  • Server.Obsolte() ... modInfo.IsHalfLifeDll should check for a value == 0 instead of < 0 (which is always false for a value of type byte)
